item.title: about
item.description: Hi, I’m Alvaro, thanks for visiting my personal site! I am currently living in Madrid, working as a Solutions Architect for BBVA Next Technologies. My job involves designing and implementing scalable, highly available distributed systems infrastructure in AWS, automating infrastructure self-service through CI/CD pipelines, and also programming orchestrating scripts and tools in Python and Go.
